website_summaries.verdict: The entry-level price point of this massage chair is hard to beat, considering the number of massage programs it offers. We also like its sleek, modern appearance.
pros: 5 pre-programmed massage routines with 9 intensity levels
Addresses all areas from the calves to the upper spine and neck
Includes separate ottoman for full relaxation
Remote control is wireless, easy to store
cons: Chair is not well-padded, motors can be felt through material

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and easy to put together. I took it out the box and put it together in under 30 minutes. Instructions are easy to read and although my box came in half opened, everything was packaged great INSIDE the box. I vibrates on the feet area and chair and also heats. The husband also loves it and uses it as a game chair and at times falls asleep on it too since it’s comfy. It did have a very strong almost unbareable smell once I took it out the box but it went away after a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Luz360

customer_reviews.title: Vibrating Heaven.
customer_reviews.text: They do have smell, kind of like a new car has. I expect that to diapate after a while . The good; conformable, easy install, and look beautiful. I'm in vibrating heaven . What a bargain. I bought two. Update: the smell went away after a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: ... chairs and ordered two more because I was so pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased two of these chairs and ordered two more because I was so pleased with them. They take a good beating at my salon. I was worried about our patrons children horsing around in them but they have shown absolutely no give or breaking down. I would buy these over and over. Now my husband is trying to get me to sneak one out of the salon for at our home! I actually use them to relax between clients and feel so invigorated after just 10 minutes of heat and massage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great. Based on other reviews I expected the smell to be more pungent, it's only barely noticeable. It is there though, but not bad like others make it out to be. These are very comfortable. Also, I read otberwise, but you actually can use only the heat separate from the vibration, you just need to understand how the remote works first. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: thatmankev

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Update We haven’t had the chair a year yet and we already have to replace it. All we feel when we sit in it is the frame of the chair. It’s extremely uncomfortable and when I sit in it more than 10 minutes my back hurts for days. The massage features are great but the durability of the chair is extremely poor. ————————————— The chair is amazing. It’s not a kneading massage. Just a vibration. But it still works on a bad back. My only complaint is the shipping speed. Please pick the USPS or UPS over fedex. It was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Childress

customer_reviews.title: ... Christmas gift and the person receiving the gift really like the massage recliner
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a Christmas gift and the person receiving the gift really like the massage recliner. I think the chair would be better if it was wider, the chair is a little snug for a larger frame person. Also, I wish the height of the chair and ottoman could be raised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the chair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I love the heating and the massaging features. Took me a while to assemble, but the wait was worth the pleasure. I have it in my "warm room" with my secondary TV where I can go when the weather gets real cold.
customer_reviews.author: oldguy8022

customer_reviews.title: ... cuff this chair made my nights possible to sleep comfortably. The smell of the material is very strong
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery for torn rotator cuff this chair made my nights possible to sleep comfortably. The smell of the material is very strong, I recommend you wipe down with vinegar to kill that strong smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality chair..Contacted the seller, no response...Should have gotten a condom with it...
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Not all claims are true
customer_reviews.text: This chair was super easy to assemble and looks great but it does not have a wireless remote as stated in the ad. It is wire-connected to the chair's power source. It does NOT massage it vibrates and that is a vastly different thing. The cushions were pretty soft at first but after about 2 weeks of use they are flat to the point that I can feel the hardware underneath and I have had to rig pillows to make it more tolerable. The box came all ripped up and disheveled although there was not any visible damage to the chair itself.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B

customer_reviews.title: Very high-quality furniture at a gr8 price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's apartment as a birthday present, and she absolutely loves this stylish modern chair with the built in massager. Easy to assemble, and we all loved the massage feature. Husband wanted to keep for us, but we delivered to her on her birthday for an awesome surprise. Grandkids loved it, too! Fit nicely in her small living room, and decor'ed nicely with her microfiber brown couch. As a waitress, she will get a nice massage daily in this beautiful chair. Massage feature also works in recline mode, too.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Update: Chair shocked me. Scared the heck out of me and was a bit intense. Chairs are now unplugged and sitting in my living room. I have contacted the seller and will see what steps they will take to make this right. It states that all returns must be in original packaging but of course we were intending to keep these chairs and threw out packaging. The massage remote is in a foreign language so I am just randomly pushing buttons for massage, time, heat, etc. The color of the brown is horribly ugly and matches nothing. It’s a strange brown color. Overall not happy with these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Recliner with Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Being your average couch potato and having a small apartment, I bought this little gem. Easy to put together and the heat and massage work well. The massage function isn’t as strong as a Swedish woman built like Arnold Schwarzenegger, but it does relax you. It’s very comfortable and helps me continue to enjoy life while undoing the stress of everyday duldrums. Very good value!
customer_reviews.author: Rafe

customer_reviews.title: Well built and very comfortable. Heats and vibrates as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife to sit out on enclosed patio to read and watch TV. We built it quickly and she is using it as I post this review. Well built and very comfortable. Heats and vibrates as advertised. Very satisfied so far with quality and operation. Now we will see how long it remains so. Amazon was amazing to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Well built and relaxing chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair was easy to put together. It was a bit bulky in the packaging for a guy with limited use of one arm, but I managed pretty well w/out any help. One thing I've noticed: it doesn't breathe very well, but instead seems to collect body heat. I always have a tinge of sweat on my back after sitting in it for an hour or so. The massage is very comfortable in the chair, as is the ottoman.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal So Far
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This chair seems really decent for the inexpensive price. My husband put it together quickly by himself and he is not that handy, so assembly must be easy. Looks good and is comfortable to sit in. Cons: It arrived with a remote that is in Spanish! I can't find a way to contact the seller for a replacement in English. (luckily, it is not that hard to figure out what the words mean) The vibration is fairly weak to what I thought it might be do. The heat function I can't feel at all.
customer_reviews.author: beachbum73

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair with nice message options.
customer_reviews.text: Considering initial cost, very happy with this purchase. Chair operates as it product page suggest, and is fairly comfortable. For me, it’s a noticeable improvement over the one it replaces. Biggest complaint, which has pretty much faded away now, is that it had a potent, chemical(like petroleum) oder when I initially unboxed/unwrapped it.
customer_reviews.author: JBL

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, two people are needed, it wasn’t easy to assemble due to some off measurements of the back of the chair and the seat, we were able to push it together enough to get the bolts through and screw on tight enough. It is very comfortable, and the massage and heat is fantastic. The PPU leather is soft and seems like it will last for awhile. I love the 360 swivel of the chair as well, it makes interacting with the rest of the living room easy and comfortable. I’m very happy with this purchase and recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chair by this thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair specifically for playing my PS4 Pro it's just incredible. It's super comfortable however I don't use the massaging system but it is perfect for sitting in front of the TV and gaming. Went together in about 15 minutes a child could put this chair together it's got two bowls that hook the backrest to the seat that's it. A brake lines it's faux leather it's super comfortable and I've had it for about 5 months and it's super comfortable by this thing of love it
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as I thought!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the chair 3 Stars because of the comfort level. The chair is very low to the ground so if you're a person with knee problems, it might be difficult getting up. Also, the backrest is not comfortable on my neck and upper shoulders because it tilts my head forward when I lean back. There is also a hard pole in the back if the seat that can be uncomfortable as well. I have to use a cushion! The vibration (not massage) is okay and it does heat up.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: WEBSITE DESCRIPTION FALSE
customer_reviews.text: They do not have 2 modes to knead the upper back, all it does is vibrate and the footrest doesn't do anything but vibrate. The vibrations are so loud that it shakes the mirrors that are hanging on my wall. The entire remote is in a different language. Also, mine came used and the leather was torn on the top of the chair and the box was so damaged, I had to throw it out, which will make returning it impossible unless I use my own money to purchase a new box. I requested a refund and still haven't heard back.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Initially this seemed like a good chair. In less than 1 year the piping on the armrests was cracking & within 1 year the faux leather fabric on the rest of the chair was beginning to crack & flake off.
customer_reviews.author: d.milligan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful,well built, along with an extremely nice full body massage feel when done. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jcb

customer_reviews.title: great relaxation for the price!
customer_reviews.text: i got this chair a couple of weeks ago for my office. I am really enjoying it! yes, the massage is vibration, not kneading. it does smell, as there is a period of off-gassing. I like the subtle heating function. the small size fits well in my postage stamp sized office. it was easy to put together. it helps my back a lot if I can take 10 minutes here and there at work to distress and this chair, with its low price fits the bill perfectly (although I noticed the price has been going up steadily from the ~$178 I spent for it). I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: ACSSC J.

customer_reviews.title: OK Product  Unresponsive Seller
customer_reviews.text: Generally comfortable chair. Very difficult to assemble took the tools and skill of a plumber used to working at odd angels to attach the back and base. Very little clearance for the nut and bolt assembly and the tools included were useless. The foot rest plug connection does not work. I believe that I left feedback for the Seller and never received a response.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L. St Peter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this chair
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this chair, I am not tall and find it hard to find chairs that work for me. It was easy to set up, I use the massage often although it took me a while to figure out the settings. The heat part is more like warm but in winter it helps. It is light weight and can be moved around easily. The ottoman does tend to wander but it's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Heath

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for deep tissues massager this is not the one. Get one that say shiatsu. If you’re looking for a nice relaxing massage from back to foot. This is it right here. Very comfortable and easy to set up. I needed to fill a space and get a better massage than what my bed was giving me. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: SexyRoxy

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable chairs for watching tv
customer_reviews.text: Nice contemporary design. Overall comfortable, but back support could be improved. Powerful massage motors delivers comforting massage. Somewhat difficult to assemble. Best done with a helper.
customer_reviews.author: Sub-z

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, upholstery peeling
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying chair but upholstery began to peel and continues to peel Reached out to seller twice awaiting response Update Seller was not helpful basically responded too bad so sad should have taken out warranty. I purchased patches on Amazon on placed on the three areas peeling. Cosmetically leaves alot to be desired but what cha gonna do
customer_reviews.author: The Captain

customer_reviews.title: Chair was easy to put together and does all the things it ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair was easy to put together and does all the things it says. Feels like a powerful bass speaker massaging your body. If it doesn't break after using it regularly, it will be upgraded to 5 stars. The foot rest even gives a powerful vibration! Note: remote is wired to chair and doesn't require batteries. The picture makes it look as if it is wireless remote that may need batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: for the price a great chair
customer_reviews.text: When I got the chair it was very easy to assemble without checking any instruction. The price was very good. It is very comfortable and I like the light massage of vibrating. The heat works very well. I would recommend buying this chair. I am using this chair for the past couple of weeks and it looks like the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kajo Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT chair
customer_reviews.text: The only reason that it gets only 4 stars is because the box arrived in terrible shape. Thankfully everything inside was fine, though. My son loves this chair. I do, too. He is almost 6' tall with back pain. The chair has a great contour, he is able to rest his head, it has decent lumbar support and the massage and heat feature is awesome. For the price, this is a fantastic chair. I'll report back if any issues arise but for now this chair rocks!
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: not for bigger people, but fits and supports most very nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the chair, stayed for the massager! foot stool massages back of calfs really nicely. Easy to install. may even buy a second one. ONE BIG DRAWBACK - Incredible smell coming out of the box. I knew this going in (other reviews) so I unpacked it in the garage and kept it there for about a week. It was fine by the time I brought it in the house. I can imagine how this would smell inside , especially in a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding me...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this chair is WAY more comfortable then I thought it was going to be!! I can't believe this chair only costs 200ish $... Probably one of the most comfy chairs I have ever sat in. The massage aspect to the chair was basic. But the comfiness of the chair makes up for it. This was a Great buy. Thanks! ... oh and lol, for some reason I received the Spanish version of this chair. It's cool though, the buttons are pretty simple to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Yourewelcome

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this item, I sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: The chair has some kind of chemical in it. Is very strong and overwhelming probly isn't safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best seat in the house!
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to hitting my chair. Easy to put together and real comfortable. I don’t use the vibrations or heating as much, but it’s a real nice add on
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Chair won't lock in place.
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. Fairly easy to assemble. Still has a chemical smell (like gasoline) a week after taken out of box and assembled. When you lean chair back and get into position the lock will not keep the chair in place. Very disappointed in chair. Massage works good but loud. and controls are in spanish which I do not speak or read.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this chair. Slight smell when opened but not more then u would anticipate for a just out of the box item. Easy to assemble did it by myself nine months pregnant. I was disappointed becaus it doesn't rock but that was my error. I cannot feel the heat but for me that is not a deal breaker. I have a hard time getting in and out of it because of the design. Again not a deal break. Comfy chair that I would definitely but again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber l Probert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and material
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair. It feels very soft and is a great colour and design. The massage and heat functionality works very well. The only negative I have was the assembly. It was all very easy except the 2 screws on the back. It didn’t seem to line up properly and it needed 2 people to get it together. There have been fights over who gets to sit in the chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable; easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable; easy to assemble; wish cord was a little longer to plug it in; cord to ottoman is ok; wish the massage controls could be adjusted more to individual tastes, ( can not just isolate one area for massage)
customer_reviews.author: jvs

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it apart to ship back for refund.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work well. It annoys my pain and not relief. I need to return but cannot get it apart to ship back for my refund. Please help.
customer_reviews.author: Tina J Hennis

customer_reviews.title: Expectations exceeded and recommend highly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife who has back issues and she loves it. She uses it maybe 2-3 times a day and the chair is MAKING her day so much more pleasant. We are in our RV 6 months during our winter stay in S. Arizona and the chair fits perfectly...in fact we may just get another to match and one that I can use :). When we get home for the other 6 months of the year will look at getting an upgraded BCP model for our house.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M. Garot

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!  Bad chair and bad company!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Uncomfortable and has a horrible chemical odor that never goes away! AND...... the seller received the returned chair and never refunded me!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: I spent weeks trying to find a chair to go in the baby’s nursery. I put another chair on my registry but then it became unavailable. This chair kept popping up in my recommendations, so I decided to give it a try. I am so glad I purchased this item. This is great for momma when I’m nursing. I can just lay back and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Simpse01

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this chair. When I placed my order, it stated that I should expect the chair to arrive between 9/18 and 9/21, but it actually arrived on 9/14!! It was very easy to assemble (only 2 bolts), and it feels great. It is very comfortable with or without the massage/heat function on. I am very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY Comfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: Aloha AMAZING AMAZON Shoppers THIS CHAIR IS COMFORTABLE AND I LOVE IT! Must have a nice massage and relax EVERY DAY! GREAT CHAIR. Comfortable and easy to use. I highly recommend this chair with durable faux leather! Capt Stan Howard IRS ENROLLED AGENT
customer_reviews.author: Captain Stan  John Lennon and Sir Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for someone of small stature
customer_reviews.text: Sits way too low for average person (I'm 5'9") and feels like your sitting on the floor (almost). Would be great for a Childs room or maybe a petite female. Luckily it didn't cost that much so it will soon be taken to Goodwill. Maybe some kid will use it for a gaming chair or something. To be fair, assembly was a piece of cake and all the electronics work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but brown is more of a maroon.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair and love it more for the price. My only complaint is I got the brown colored one. It is more of a maroon from the pictures it looked dark brown. So it clashes a bit with my decor and should be labeled as dark maroon.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Recliner Chair
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair and it fits into my bedroom perfectly, however I wish it had more intensity to it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Alston

customer_reviews.title: DESCRIPTION LIES
customer_reviews.text: Yes the chair is ready to assemble. Yes the chair is comfortable. Yes it looks nice. But it is a lie! There is NOTHING massage about it. It's a vibratory. The intensity only vibrates louder. WHERE ARE THE 2 KNEADING OPTIONS??? Meeting it because I don't know how to put back in box. It's too big. Plus I spent 30 minutes assembling it. Nice color! Ugh LIES!!!DECEPTION!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chante

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect such comfort when I purchased this chair. It is versatile as far as the heating, the reclining and cushioning. I have placed this chair in the den and watch TV and read and do the Ipad thing and it is very, very comfortable. I brought two of these now and all I can say is I am pleasantly surprised and WOW! Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann Serbio

customer_reviews.title: This chair is great love all the different settings for both my wife ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great love all the different settings for both my wife and I. Really think it will cut back on the chiropractic visits.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: and it's so comfortable that I never finish watching a movie because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this chair with no problems which was a big plus! I watch television in it daily, and it's so comfortable that I never finish watching a movie because I fall asleep in it! Love it for the price too!
customer_reviews.author: LISA JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This chair was super easy to put together. It does not have rollers to knead you. It vibrates really well though and the foot rest also has the vibration. The heat works great, perfect for cold days, or when you don't feel good and you need the extra warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: It's a good chair
customer_reviews.text: Good chair and works as advertised. Makes you have good posture by making you sit correctly because if you don't it's kinda uncomfortable. Heats up, massages and reclines. Mine did smell chemically for about a month and a half but now smells fine. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a massage chair. This is not the one like at the mall or costco that is $3,000, but it is pretty awesome for the price. Very comfy chair, the massage part is good. Good deal if you are on a budget
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: 2 year review.
customer_reviews.text: has been 2 years to the month I have purchased this chair. overall im happy with it but my only complaint is on the wear areas the leather has already started to crack. I use this as a computer chair, the headrest and where my elbows go has cracked. I really figured it would last longer then 2 years but im already looking for a new chair because the cracks are bothering me. I don't use the heated seat or massage anymore that was a novelty thing in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon so Amazing 👏
customer_reviews.text: Love it... I bought it for my hard working God mother... she deserves it... she's in love, due to covid19 she works from home alot and I just can't take her being uncomfortable sitting at her kitchen table on her laptop for hours... so I got her this lovely well worth it, massage chair. She's very excited and comfy now she can kick her feet up and actually relax and work according to her schedule and last but not least get a massage and actually enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not your best choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my wife because the reviews basically praised it. It definitely falls short of any praiseworthy notions. It was all easy to assemble but the ottoman is wobbly. The chair, once bolted together, is comfortable but lopsided. Frankly, this should be called a vibrating chair instead of a massage chair ; it will heat up and vibrate but definitely not massage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked great but...
customer_reviews.text: Seat had a tear in it. Now I have to deal with returning this chair since amazon doesn't pickup for returns on this order.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our camper and they are so comfortable. The only issue was one hand control was English and one was in Spanish. Luckily it has not been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: llewison

customer_reviews.title: OK chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is worth what I paid for it, not as comfortable as I had hoped, had an offensive smell for a short while. Everything works but not sure how long this will last with constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Ciccone Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: It looks so nice in my office and the heat and vibration is so relaxing. very comfy with lots of deep padding i'm 5.4 my hubby is 6-4 and we both love it
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne S.

customer_reviews.title: Lied about the features and lied about not receiving my refund
customer_reviews.text: The description says two modes for kneading. This is misleading because it only vibrates. The controls are in Spanish. I'm not tall, but even for me, it's abnormally low with no ability to raise the height. Still contemplating where or not to return it because it IS comfortable. after 7 months, no refund. Amazon stepped in and made them refund
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The chair is a great deal for the price. It is comfortable. Smelled a little coming out of box, but the smell is gone now. Overall great chair.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable chair and the vibrator massage works for me when I leave it on for 20-minutes or more. The chair back reclines and there is a vibrator in the foot rest as well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving the product score 2 stars because one of the arms broke down a little over 8 months of use. The chair has been well taken care of and has not seen heavy use so I’m going to ask the company if they are willing to do an exchange in my situation. Hopefully this is a fluke defect and I will upgrade my review to a higher rating if the company will consider an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Needs 12 people to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most difficult thing I have EVER assembled and for this price, I expected something that didn't take 6 hours to put together! No matter what I do, there's no way to get both of the bolts in that hold together the top piece and the bottom piece. It's straight forward and I have assembled many office, living room and other chairs and none have been so difficult. For the price you charge, you should really figure out a way to make this easier.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't quite as comfy for me as I'd hoped, but it's not too bad. My mother, who is a little taller than I, really likes it. My main complaint is the chemical odor - I've had it for several months and can still smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: got this chair for my husband and he LOVE it. He have often back pains and after ...
customer_reviews.text: got this chair for my husband and he LOVE it. He have often back pains and after 30 minutes in the chair he is doing so much better
customer_reviews.author: the danish girl

customer_reviews.title: Took 3 weeks and still the smell from the so called Fake Leather will run you out of your home so bad.
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this chair is Horrid. Took 3 weeks and still the smell from the so called Fake Leather will run you out of your home so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great buy on a great chair.
customer_reviews.text: This chair assembled easily in half an hour. Really comfortable and the heat and massage are a plus. The back cradles ones back like it’s supporting it. Highly recommend this for anyone who wants a great substitute for a big recliner.
customer_reviews.author: jpierce210

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my chair! I use it everyday. The leather is nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ida R Blakeney

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! First of all it wasn't supposed to arrive till next Wednesday and it came early!! It was a snap to put together and it works fantastic!!! Will probably be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It was fairly easy to assemble and the massage works great
customer_reviews.text: I recently order this chair and it came in a quick timely manner. It was fairly easy to assemble and the massage works great. I like all the different mode and intensity options. I do think however it sits very very low to the ground. I almost think I got a wrong chair cylinder or something.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Vukic

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Can feel massagers and not the best massager but comfortable with blanket over it and decent chair. Everyone loves to sit in it
customer_reviews.author: Just_a_regular

customer_reviews.title: very nice chair
customer_reviews.text: i took it out of the box put it together plugged it in and turned it on sat down and fell asleep.....nice
customer_reviews.author: kevin mcd

customer_reviews.title: Made in China 👎
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my man cave so far it seams to be a good product. The smell is not too bad like some of the other reviews complained about. BTW it is very comfortable and yes it only vibrates no big deal. Perfect for what I need. Have this for a year now. The lower bushing that the chair swivel on is worn out and the chair rocks back and forth a lot! Made in China 🇨🇳 go figure 🤨
customer_reviews.author: Scion06

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you specify when purchasing this one. The control came in spanish writing.
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair, but you will need more cushioning for the seat because you will feel the medal in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: PatGentlebrown

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs...I bought two of them...great massage & heat settings. Even the ottman has a massage setting, great price, Im very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best seat in the house
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well made. Works great. I would have liked a longer power cord but this is a minor gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A.

customer_reviews.title: Remote Confusing
customer_reviews.text: you cant select one part of body to message- just cycles thru 9 modes with no instructions on what the modes are?
customer_reviews.author: Peter Capo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Do like it!
customer_reviews.text: Remote is in Spanish. The chair does not adjust height and it is a bit noisy, especially if being used. But otherwise comfy and enjoyed by everyone in the house and the pets lol
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great size and comfort
customer_reviews.text: The size and comfort are both perfect for my mother who recently took up residence in an assisted living facility.
customer_reviews.author: bgif51

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble, looks classy and the massage and heat are great after a long day of work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: these seem great just got them, for our camper sit very nice the massage is on a timer which I dont care for. I like to sleep in my chair with the massager running
customer_reviews.author: Bob Utterback

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair
customer_reviews.text: Had the chair for over 3 months now , no issues what so ever. Very comfortable to sit back and watch the game
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Misalignments
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put together. The parts don't align! Nice once I finally got it assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Vashti

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. Chair is comfortable. Has different modes. Can choose area or use the factory modes. It's a little lower to the ground, so it can be hard to get out of.
customer_reviews.author: amy ruzynski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a massage chair, it’s just a vibration chair. I’m deeply disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product st a great price-took about 30 minutes to put together. Surprised at the quality level at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L. Burks

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It helps me so much. I was sick and had to sleep sitting up, this chair was a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Fink

customer_reviews.title: Price comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love love this chair. The size is perfect not to small and not to big. Love the massage it gives. For the cost unbelievable. It is a great chair and especially for the price. You can order this chair without hesitation. Easy to put together.Looks quite rich.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Boyd

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: Wow...I like this product. the chair is so comfortable and the massaging and heat is wonderful. My grandkids couldn't get enough of sitting in this chair. My granddaughter is five years old and she loves it. For the price I would tell anyone to purchase it. It does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just got it. I’m a novice at assembling things and had it together and working within @15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: The reviews helped me make my decision. The only thing I don't personally care for is the vibration by my head. The chair is so comfortable. The smell is a bit strong when unpacked. Aired out in the garage for a day and sprayed some febreze and that took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: ShayRem

customer_reviews.title: Makes me king
customer_reviews.text: Very good massage chair Nice product, Good Quality, Filling good, Smart chair. I'm happy with my porches and good price.
customer_reviews.author: New raider.

customer_reviews.title: Too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chair works as advertised, but it is too uncomfortable for me to sit in for more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: swilbert80

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable chair!
customer_reviews.text: I got this chair to relax and watch TV in the basement Recliners usually hurt my back so I was looking for something comfortable with plenty of support. This chair fits the bill. It is very comfy and was easy to put together. I have only had it a few days but it seems well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Debra McLean

customer_reviews.title: phenomenal for us, bummer for the downstairs neighbors!
customer_reviews.text: It's fantastic. If you live in an apartment, it will vibrate the floor, so I recommend (unless you're on the ground floor) letting your neighbors below you know that you bought it 😊
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Black

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Faux Leather Electric Massage Recliner Chair w/Stool Ottoman, Remote Control, 5 Modes - Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

True relaxation should never require a compromise on style. With a soft faux leather upholstery and integrated, remote-controlled massage system, this recliner and ottoman set provides endless comfort and convenience. The ergonomic design of this chair is complimented by a variety of ways to customize your massage experience, perfect to sink into after a long day of work. 

Specifications: 
Chair Dimensions: 27”- 46”(L) x 29”(W) x 41”(H) 
Ottoman: 20”(L) x 16”(W) x 16”(H) 
Floor-to-Seat: 17"(H) 
Backrest: 29”(L) x 22”(W) 
Seat: 20”(L) x 20”(W) 
Armrest: 24”(L) 
Chair Weight Capacity: 250 lbs. 
Ottoman Weight Capacity: 200 lbs. 
Weight: 45 lbs. 
Color: Black 
Material: PU Leather, Metal 
Volts: 110V 
Assembly required (with instructions) 

Package Includes: 
Massage chair 
Ottoman
feature_bullets: MASSAGE + HEAT: Loosen up from top to bottom with heat in the chair's backrest, plus massage points in the seat and ottoman to knead the upper and lower back, lumbar, thighs, and calves
CHARMING FURNITURE: This comfy addition to your living space also provides an elegant, inviting appearance that makes the living room and more look and feel like home

COMFORTABLE RECLINE: A double-padded backrest reclines for blissful relaxation, while soft armrest, seat, and ottoman cushions provide optimal comfort. You can also keep a book or magazine at your side with a built-in storage side pouch
CONTROL OPTIONS: Wireless controller lets you conveniently switch between 5 pre-programmed massages, 9 intensity levels, and 2 modes to get the most soothing lounging experience possible

EASY ASSEMBLY: Set this chair up in 3 easy steps; simply attach the ottoman footrest to its base, then attach the chair seat to its base before inserting screws; CHAIR DIMENSIONS: 27"-46"(L) x 29"(W) x 41"(H); Chair Weight Capacity: 250 lbs.
